mapper.insert: insert into roominfo(R_num, R_roomtype, R_floor,duetime) values (#{R_num}, #{R_roomtype}, #{R_floor},#{duetime})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from roominfo,roomtype where roominfo.R_roomtype = roomtype.R_roomtype
and roominfo.R_roomtype = (select R_roomtype from roomtype where roomtype.typename = #{typename} limit 1)
